measurements_data.comments: Paper/cardboard includes paper (5.34 percent), cardboard (6.13 percent), Al-coated cardboard (1.01 percent), and waxed cardboard (1.09 percent) waste; plastic includes plastic bags (5.61 percent), hard plastic (3.39 percent), and plastic packaging (3.73 percent) waste; metal inclues aluminum cans (0.26 percent), metal packaging and other (1.12 percent) waste; rubber/leather reported as leather; other includes fines (7.82 percent), disposable diapers (3.65 percent), and textile (5.25 percent) waste
